comments:
On a dstore-linux-rexec, connection, select (Root)/folk/mober/RSETest/dir,
choose rightclick > Create Remote Project.

It silently fails, Errorlog shows backtrace:

The problem was that we would set attributes (such as readonly) when the file didn't even exist.  This is fixed now.

traces.message: Could not write to read-only file: '/dir/.project'.
